answer.using: only the relevant regions of text

novel context zoom - in network ( ConZNe.from sentence: To address the issues above we develop a novel context zoom - in network ( ConZNet ) for RC tasks , which can skip through irrelevant parts of a document and generate an answer using only the relevant regions of text .

first phase.from sentence:
The ConZNet architecture consists of two phases .
In the first phase we identify the relevant regions of text by employing a reinforcement learning algorithm .

encoder - decoder architecture.from sentence: The second phase is based on an encoder - decoder architecture , which comprehends the identified regions of text and generates the answer by using a residual self - attention network as encoder and a RNNbased sequence generator along with a pointer network as the decoder .

relevant regions.from sentence: Unlike existing approaches , our method has the ability to select relevant regions of text not just based on the question but also on how well regions are related to each other .

our decoder.from sentence: Moreover , our decoder combines span prediction and sequence generation .

allows.from sentence: This allows the decoder to copy words from the relevant regions of text as well as to generate words from a fixed vocabulary .
